Physician-Scientist,pursing PhD in Human Genetics and Genomics at the [University of Miami Miller School of Medicine](https://med.miami.edu/graduate-studies/doctoral-programs/human-genetics-and-genomics), working at the intersection of genetics, genomics,epigenetics, pathology,epidemiology of Neurological,Oncological & Rare disorders.

**Research interests:** Genetics, genomics,epigenetics of human diseases with a focus on precision medicine and public health.
